title: 999 wins, would love a rioter to join me
body: I've heard that rioters sometimes do special things for peoples' 1000th win, so I was wondering if one could join me for my 1000th normal win :D

replies.body: I got you dude. Inv sent.

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=GdXFZpBI,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-22T03:24:21.531+0000)
>
> I got you dude. Inv sent.

Botboy22's Reaction after seeing this post.
I'm about 100 wins over the 1000 mark but I was never knew rioters would play with you for your 1000 win, could I still get that? :D

Why is this getting downvotes for no reason?! wtf? the guy just wants a rioter to play with him like they do for other people.

+1 lmao

Because League is toxic cesspool of disease-minded children jealous that they don't have 1000 wins.

That or a forum vote bot accidentally targeted the wrong thread.

To me, these things are proof that Riot actually interacts with their player base, and plays their own god damn games. I would be interested in knowing what champions Rioters use. Would they be scumbag champs, or ones that take mechanical skill?
*cough* if i was a rioter i would always buff teemo
apparently i can only upvote this once.

A lot of rioters play a lot of champions.

I'm suspect the target of you're post is the balance team. To which the answer is unknown. Feel free to look them up though. I doubt it would be that hard.
just wondering, but why would anybody be jealous over someone else wasting that much time of their life on a video game??

some people have been playing this game for 5 years, I for one have played almost 800 games on aram alone and have been playing on and off (mostly on since last year :p) and I started during the end of season 2.
 if you add up all the games I have played, it would be about 2000, and thats with college, a job, going out with friends, job training for half a year (with no internet the whole time) moving, staying with my sister for the holiday for a month (again, no internet) etc, etc.
My point is, 1000 wins is not unheard of and reaching that doesn't require having no life to do. It just means that you like to play this in your free time.
Good point
its not a waste of time, would a kid going to a soccer match be a waste of his time? no hes practicing, league is an official sport now and it just means a lot of practice has been put into it

Soccer has a few uses.

1) Physical coordination.
2) face-to-face social interaction.
3) learn how to fight.
4) learn how to loose.
5) going pro.

If the ~~monster~~ kid is not going pro, and is learning these skills from other avenues, then soccer is a waste of time.

Learning to fight from soccer. ok.
Just whatever you do if you get into a drunken brawl don't just fall over and scream REF! They will probably just beat you and laugh.

*{looks at the down votes}*
Well... At least **someone** enjoyed that joke.

"monster" lol soccer players are a bunch of crybabys

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LC-H2wXK4T4
It's not a waste of your life if it is your life.
how did you get the blitzcrank poro icon?

Purchased it with RP in the shop. In the client, click the orange chest under your summoner name that takes you to the shop, then select the "Summoner Icons" tab on the left. The icon should be for sale near the top of the list.

envy and jealousy, it's everywhere in this community.
Rekt
I got downvoted for saying that the new project skins are amazing in a sarcastic way.
wait so 1000 wins ? do they commonly play with people, that's pretty cool.
Gonna hit that like button, i mean wouldnt we all like to play with a rioter @ 1k wins?
Here's an upvote to compensate for random-ass downvoters.
Rito does special stuff for 1,000 wins? Crap, I hit that months ago and had no idea Q.Q
ill upvote so ya hopefully can
What if you lose? then you wont get 1000 wins it will still be 999.
At 1,911 wins. How many Rioters do you get for the 2,000th? Never had one for my 1,000th because I didn't even know they did that.
Just curious, what happens if you lose your game with a rioter? do you play more?
You never lose with a Rioter.

> L4T3NCY (NA)  - about 16 hours ago 1 of 1 Rioter Comments
I got you dude. Inv sent.

I think this is great :) Thanks for doing it !   I Really believe actions like these from you and others set Riot apart from the rest.  Always an up-vote from me when I see these type of threads :)
So what if they do join you but you guys lose that round? That means another one until 1000th win!
soooo what do i get once i OWN EVERY SINGLE T3 RUNE IN ALL OF LEAGUE MWAHAHAHAHHAHA (4050 ip away... so close)
it happended im so happy
Can We get some match History? How did the Game Go?
521 more wins to go for me
I never got a Rioter to play with me on my 1000th win I even posted a while ago. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
aw man i missed out D: i have like 1400 wins :/ *cries*
damn man i wish i got to play with a rioter on my 1000 th win im reachin close to 3k wins and have never got to play with a rioter :(

hey botboy22 um hate to be a grammar nazi, but for future reference, it's people's not peoples'. this is, because people in that sense is plural already, but if you were to say persons( btw that is a word) it would then be persons' as an example. thanx please dont hate me {{champion:17}}
You know, the please don't hate me plea is much less effective with the Teemo behind it
glhf
I'm still working on getting 300 wins so far. Soon I will catch up.
I definitely requested one for my 1000 wins, but I didn't get any love. Though, it's not THAT bad, seeing as I was matched with 3 Rioters total,  in 2 games of matchmaking.
I start lots of riots. I would love to play with you.
